messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Att Jodye
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Jodye, I really liked your posting and found myself sitting in front of the screen nodding as I read! LOL By the way, my first child flat out refused to
messages.messageBody:
Hi Jodye,
I really liked your posting and found myself sitting in front of the screen
nodding as I read! LOL By the way, my first child flat out refused to nurse
from my left breast so feeling terribly wicked I simply fed her from the
right one all the time!! I didn't dare tell anyone but hey, it worked! She
nursed until about a year and thrived.
Recently a friend had the same issue with her 11 month old boy refusing one
breast and she too merely began feeding him solely from the other - no harm
done! Just a thought for next time maybe? (((hugs)))

Namaste
Brooke
